hymn.title: O Master, let me walk with Thee
hymn.category: Service—By a Closer Walk with the Lord

lyrics.stanza: O Master, let me walk with Thee In lowly paths of service free; Tell me Thy secret, help me bear The strain of toil, the fret of care.
Help me the slow of heart to move By some clear, winning word of love; Teach me the wayward feet to stay, And guide them in the Godward way.
Teach me Thy patience; still with Thee In closer, dearer company, In work that keeps faith sweet and strong, In trust that triumphs over wrong.
In hope that sends a shining ray Far down the future's broad'ning way, In peace that only Thou canst give, With Thee, O Master, let me live.
